mapper.select: select reply.*, user.nickname, user.level_image from reply left join simple_board.user on reply.user_idx=user.idx where reply.board_idx=#{boardIdx} order by written_date asc, reply_seq asc, reply_depth asc;
mapper.insert:
insert into reply(board_idx, user_idx, content) value(#{boardIdx},#{userIdx},#{content});
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS IDX
mapper.update: update reply set parent_reply_idx=#{parentIdx} where board_idx=#{boardIdx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where board_idx=#{boardIdx};
mapper.update: update reply set content=#{content}, modify_date=now() where idx=#{idx} and board_idx=#{boardIdx} and user_idx=#{userIdx};
mapper.delete: delete from reply where idx=#{idx} and board_idx=#{boardIdx} and user_idx=#{userIdx};
